item.description:
The Taste of the Caribbean is a one-day festival of Caribbean Food, Culture, Music, Games and Traditions.

I will Be helping in the information tent!!!!!!!!

WHAT TO EXPECT!

FREE ADMISSION to one of Hartford’s
most family-friendly events, showcasing Greater
Hartford’s vibrant Caribbean community. Enjoy the
food of the Caribbean, Caribbean culture, music,
dance and travel. Now in its fourth year, attendees
of the festival can expect top notch, family-friendly
and quality entertainment that the event has built its
reputation on. All set in the back drop of one of
Hartford’s most pristine outdoor riverfront venues,
Mortensen Riverfront Plaza.

*CARIBBEAN FOOD AND MERCHANDISE
*CHILDREN'S VILLAGE
*DOMINO TOURNAMENT
*CONTESTS (Enter to win trips, food baskets with samples of Caribbean food), Spa Packages and Dinner for two.
*HEALTH INFORMATION
LIVE ENTERTAINMENT featuring

INTERNATIONAL SUPERSTARS
• Reggae artist FRANKIE PAUL
• Jazz Singer KAREN SMITH
• Reggae, Calypso & R&B band RUFF STUFF BAND
• Guyanese Chutney artist, TERRY GAJRAJ
with the SUPERTONES BAND
• Spouge artist LOU DRAYTON of Barbados
• ST. LUCIAN FOLK SINGERS AND DANCE
TROUPE of New York City

LOCAL HARTFORD TALENT
• Spanish dance group LATIN MIX
• Steel pan band THE HARTFORD STEEL SYMPHONY
• Gospel Artist CHARMIN BLAKE
• Reggae singers SLEDGE, MYSTERY & DON C
• Dominican & mixed Caribbean band VOG BAND
• Folk singers VOICES OF THE CARIBBEAN
• Latin band KARIBE MAMBO

DANCE LESSONS (salsa, merengue, soca and calypso)
TRAVEL VILLAGE (get travel information on your favorite Caribbean destination)

Event possible through the generous contributions of
American Airlines, Community Health Services, Western Union, State Farm Insurance, Price Chopper, Greater Hartford Arts Council, Grace Kennedy Ltd, Evelyn W. Preston Memorial Fund/Band of America, Holiday Inn SunSpree Montego Bay Jamaica, West Indian Foundation, Carib Lager Beer, JN Money Transfer, Jamaica Tourist Board, Heineken USA, St Kitts Tourist Board and the West Indian Celebration Committee. Event hosted by Riverfront Recapture and supported by CAYASCO, Inc.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll give my # a few days before
